description: Cottage cheese, potato and peas cooked with delicious indian spices.
name: Cottage Cheese Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g cottage cheese, cut into small cubes
1 potato, thinly sliced into small squares

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil. Add cumin seeds and let it cook for 20 seconds.
Add onion with salt and cook for 5 minutes until onions is nicely caramelized.
Add potato, pea, ginger paste, garlic paste, chill paste, chill powder and turmeric powder. Mix everything together and cook for 10 minutes until potato is cooked.
Add tomato and cook for another 5 minutes.
Add cottage cheese and mix everything together. Cook for further 5 minutes to allow the flavours to combine.
Serve hot with roti / flat bread.
